salmon.user_instruction: I need to check on the salmon we're planning to have for dinner; could you find it in the fridge?
habits: Enjoys having a weekly dinner with freshly bought seafood.
Stores seafood in specific compartments in the fridge to keep it fresh.
Wraps salmon in butcher paper before refrigerating to retain moisture.
Keeps the seafood on the shelf closer to the freezer for optimal temperature.
Uses lemon slices with the salmon to enhance flavor before cooking.
Regularly checks the freshness of refrigerated items before meal preparation.
Labels the items in the fridge with the purchase date for better inventory management.
Arranges the fridge shelves in an order: beverages, vegetables, meats, then seafood.
Performs a cleanup of the fridge every other week.
Prefers to consume perishable seafood items within a couple of days of purchase.
Plans dinners in advance and arranges the necessary ingredients in the fridge.
Likes to marinate salmon briefly with herbs and lemon juice before refrigerating.
Tends to place a small pot_plant in the fridge for natural freshness.
